title: Bug 289816Potentially unclosed stream in org.aspectj.weaver.bcel.BcelWorld
description: Bug 289816Potentially unclosed stream in org.aspectj.weaver.bcel.BcelWorld Created attachment 147526 [details]Eclipse workspace patch that closes the stream correctlyIn method lookupJavaClass(), one has to close a stream used by ClassParser.This should be done in a finally block, since parse() may fail and throw anIOException.
OB: Right now, the stream is left open in that case.A path to correctly close the stream is attached.
